edu.ou.asgbook.distance.EuclideanDTPropagation

edu.ou.asgbook.distance.EuclideanDTPropagation Class Reference

static void main (String[] args) throws Exception

Detailed Description

Implementation of Euclidean distance that updates the distance instead of computing it afresh each time.

Author:
v.lakshmanan

Member Function Documentation

int  thresh

At every pixel, finds the square of the Euclidean distance to the nearest pixel > thresh.

Implements edu.ou.asgbook.distance.EuclideanDT.

00026                                                                         {
00027         int nrows = data.getNumLat();
00028         int ncols = data.getNumLon();
00029         final int MAXDIST = nrows * nrows + ncols * ncols;
00030         LatLonGrid dist = new LatLonGrid(nrows, ncols, MAXDIST,
00031                 data.getNwCorner(), data.getLatRes(), data.getLonRes());
00032         dist.fill(dist.getMissing());
00033         for (int i = 0; i < nrows; ++i)
00034             for (int j = 0; j < ncols; ++j) {
00035                 if (data.getValue(i, j) > thresh) {
00036                     dist.setValue(i, j, 0);
00037                     propagate(dist, i, j, 250*250);
00038                 }
00039             }
00040         return dist;
00041     }
